item.title: Simple Flask Example - Part 1
item.description: Deploying Flask Apps into Google Cloud Platform There are many Flask tutorials online that describe the details of using the lightweight Python framework. With this series I do not intend to recreate the exhaustive tutorials that have been done. I simply wanted a quick 3-post series to get up and running with deploying Flask to GCP App Engine and using data from Big Query. Within this post, Part 1, we will create a Flask app locally and then push it to GCP App Engine.
